entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Norfolk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:41 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.6°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. High zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain mixed with snow. Temperature rising to plus 1 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to rain or snow this evening then to periods of snow overnight. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Temperature rising to plus 1 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
